name: Nova
description: Nova is Canadian LP Tweed’s version of Pennywise, an indica-dominant cannabis strain with an equal ratio of THC and CBD. This combination of cannabinoids offers enhanced therapeutic effects for patients treating pain, anxiety, inflammation, stress disorders, and many other symptoms and conditions. Nova combines genetics from Jack the Ripper and Harlequin, who pass on relaxed and focused effects perfect for daytime medicating or productive afternoons. The aroma is subtle, but sweet woody notes with spicy pepper undertones can be detected on the exhale.
descriptionPlain: Nova is Canadian LP Tweed’s version of Pennywise, an indica-dominant cannabis strain with an equal ratio of THC and CBD. This combination of cannabinoids offers enhanced therapeutic effects for patients treating pain, anxiety, inflammation, stress disorders, and many other symptoms and conditions. Nova combines genetics from Jack the Ripper and Harlequin, who pass on relaxed and focused effects perfect for daytime medicating or productive afternoons. The aroma is subtle, but sweet woody notes with spicy pepper undertones can be detected on the exhale.

highlightedReviews.text: So gooooooood for pain and inflammation. I am feeling so much better. I had vaped some cannatonic earlier in the day (which provided relief but made me antisocial and sleepy) and this weed made me more focused than before and totally, completely at ease (socially and pain wise) when I vaped it a few hours later.

I just love this strain for daytime medication and use it to cut down higher thc such as alien og for my night time meds. 
daytime meds release me from panic and anxiety and for night time it puts me to sleep. I also take a bit of mmj infused honey to stay asleep which is a godsend being that i had a spinal fusion from T10 all the way down to s

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Motavation, Leonidas, Blue Cookies, Bogart, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
‚ÄãAnother batch of new strains have been entered, and we're curious to see how many you've tried! We've got new Girl Scout Cookie hybrids for the Cookie lovers and Spartan warlord-themed sativas for fans of brutality ripped dudes in capes. Even more new varieties can be found in the Leafly Explorer (remember: you can sort by newest or you can use our strain filters to select from custom effects, flavors, and benefits).
All right, strain hunters ‚Äî go forth, explore, and document your adventures in a strain review!
¬†
 1. Motavation
Characteristics of Motavation:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Sensi Star and Warlock
Sweet, fruity, and floral aroma
Heavy and relaxing with some creativity
May help with anxiety, muscle spasms, pain, and insomnia

¬†
 2. Leonidas
Characteristics of Leonidas:

Mostly sativa strain
Super Silver Haze variation produced by Canadian LP Tweed
Cross between Haze, Skunk #1, and Northern Lights
Happy, focused effects
Sour citrus aroma
May help with depression, fatigue, and stress

¬†
 3. Blue Cookies
Characteristics of Blue Cookies:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and Blueberry
Sweet berry and cherry aroma
Intense cerebral euphoria coupled with full-body relaxation

¬†
 4. Nova
Characteristics of Nova:

80/20 high-CBD indica-dominant strain
Canadian LP Tweed‚Äôs version of Pennywise
Sweet woody and spicy pepper aroma
Relaxed and focused effects
May help treat pain, anxiety, inflammation, and stress disorders

¬†
 5. Bogart
Characteristics of Bogart:

Hybrid strain
A rendition of OG Kush distributed by Canadian LP Tweed 
Earthy, woody pine aroma
Suitable for consumers with a high tolerance
May help with PTSD, nausea, pain, and stress.

¬†
 6. Super Bud
Characteristics of Super Bud:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Big Bud and Skunk
Sweet, fruity aroma
Heavily relaxing effects

¬†
 7. Sunshine
Characteristics of Sunshine:

Sativa-dominant strain
Produced by the Canadian LP Peace Naturals Project
Sweet fruity and citrus flavors
Blissful, happy, uplifted effects
May help treat pain, nausea, and appetite loss

growInfo.growNotes:
May express one of four different phenotypes, differing only in shape and structure
	Resistant to mildew
